function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of economic, environmental, and social outcomes of interventions related to Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) control in buildings","Impact":"Ineffective interventions and potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of comprehensive understanding of outcomes","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough quantitative studies to assess the economic, environmental, and social impacts of IAQ control interventions","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, building performance simulation software","People":"Occupants of buildings, public health, and environmental health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, building management authorities"},{"Description":"Limited exploration of social effects of FM strategies and inconsistent findings","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of social effects may lead to ineffective or inappropriate interventions for disease control","Mitigation":"Conducting more comprehensive studies to understand the social impacts of FM strategies, gathering feedback from occupants and stakeholders","Technologies":"Sociological research methods, survey tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Occupants of buildings, public health professionals, building management authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, building management authorities"},{"Description":"Unwarranted assumptions regarding occupant productivity and work schedules","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the effects of occupant schedules on productivity may lead to ineffective interventions and health risks","Mitigation":"Conducting evidence-based studies to understand the relationship between occupant schedules and productivity, avoiding unwarranted assumptions","Technologies":"Work productivity measurement tools, data analysis software, survey tools","People":"Occupants of buildings, employers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, employers, public health organizations"}]}
